title: Sales Manager Agency
content:
Teads is looking for a motivated Sales person to join our growing Agency division. As a Sales Manager Agency, you will be responsible for a portfolio of strategic agencies for Teads.
Your main mission will be to promote the sale of our solutions to agencies and direct advertisers.
Your main responsibilities will be to

Find and develop a relationship of trust with prospecting clients
Ensure a regular presence with your clients: meetings, presentations, events...
Identify new business opportunities
Provide a strong consulting dimension and a high-quality service
Propose relevant media recommendations adapted to your clients' needs
Work in close collaboration with the various internal areas of expertise (Insights, Creative Studio, Account Management, Platform...) in order to best meet client requirements
Build and negotiate annual partnerships
Ensure sales targets are met

 
Experience/background

A first successful experience (3 years as a minimum) in prospecting, developing the loyalty of accounts and selling online media is particularly appreciated
You have a very good knowledge of the Media/Advertising ecosystem, and you like to keep up to date with innovations in this sector
Knowledge of online video solutions is a real plus
You have excellent interpersonal skills and a very good level of speech
Curious, dynamic, you show initiative on a daily basis and enjoy working in a team
Adaptable, flexible and a good listener, you have a strong sense of customer service and like to find solutions
If you are ambitious, enterprising, eager to succeed and looking for an exciting role in a dynamic and passionate environment, then join us!

 
About Teads
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, omnichannel platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media.

As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies. For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers and content providers.
Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach billions of unique monthly users in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.
Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries.
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
